title: Legion of Super-Heroes Chronology 2013-08 Part 4 Post-Flashpoint
description:
Complete chronology of all Legion of Super-Heroes, Legionnaires and L.E.G.I.O.N./R.E.B.E.L.S. appearances up through the October, 2013 issue of Legion of Super-Heroes (final issue).

The torrents are broken down as such:

Part 1: The Original Legion of Super-Heroes from cover dates April, 1958 through August, 1989

Part 1.5: The Five Years Later Legion which continues the tales of the Legion from 
Part 1 but with heavy retcons from November, 1989 through September, 1994.

Part 2: The Post-Zero Hour Legion, featuring the tales of the Legion of Super-Heroes from Earth 247, covering the issues from October, 1994 through November, 2004.

Part 3: The Threeboot and Retroboot Legions, features the Earth Prime (aka Threeboot) Legion and the return of the original Legion from Part 1 (but excluding Part 1.5) with retcons to fit them to modern continuity.  These Legion versions were published side-by-side for a bit, from February, 2005 through October, 2011.

Part 4: The Post-Flashpoint Legion, continuing the tales of the Retroboot Legion from Part 3 with retcons to fit them to the New 52 Continuity.  November, 2011 through October, 2013


These files are modified from the original releases, so please be aware of this when sharing in IRC/DC, the TTHs will NOT match up.  Please only share on other torrent sites and as a whole collection.
